name.description: The name of the subnet, for use within k2 configurations.

az.description: Name of the Availability Zone (AZ) in AWS. Regions and AZs are documented [here](http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/UserGuide/using-regions-availability-zones.html#concepts-available-regions).

cidr.description: The cidr to associate to the subnet (within the VPC).

enablePublicIPs.description: Do we allow for Auto-assigned Public IPs, Our clusters default to true
